snippet: Ryo Ishikawa of Japan and Thaworn Wiratchant of Thailand accepted special invitations to the Masters.
abstract: Ryo Ishikawa and Thaworn Wiratchant accept special invitations to the Masters golf tournament.
lead_paragraph: Ryo Ishikawa of Japan and Thaworn Wiratchant of Thailand accepted special invitations to the Masters.

headline.seo: Ryo Ishikawa and Thaworn Wiratchant Get Invites to Masters
headline.main: Ishikawa and Wiratchant Invited to Augusta
